instanceVariables.name: TileSize
instanceVariables.desc: The width and height of the "Wall" objects/tiles that compose the board

instanceVariables.name: Score
instanceVariables.desc: Player's score according to the number of dots, big dots and ghosts eaten

instanceVariables.name: Lives
instanceVariables.desc: The number of player's lives left

instanceVariables.name: playerRespawnTime
instanceVariables.desc: The time (in seconds) for the player to respawn when a life is lost

instanceVariables.name: nbGhost
instanceVariables.desc: Number of ghosts eaten during the current vulnerability period

instanceVariables.name: bigDotScore
instanceVariables.desc: The number of points of score added when a bigDot is eaten

instanceVariables.name: dotScore
instanceVariables.desc: The number of points of score added when a dot is eaten

instanceVariables.name: ghostEscapeTime
instanceVariables.desc: The time (in seconds) a ghost will be vulnerable for (before blinking to announce the end of the vulnerability period)

instanceVariables.name: ghostBlinkTime
instanceVariables.desc: The time (in seconds) a ghost will blink before stopping being vulnerable

instanceVariables.name: Alive
instanceVariables.desc: Is the player alive, helps preventing two lives if two overlapping ghosts collide with the player
